column1: Services will be at 2:00 p.m. on Tuesday
column4: at James H. Davis Funeral Home in Owensboro Kentucky.  Entombment  will follow in Owensboro Memorial Gardens Cemetery.  Visitation will be from 4:00 - 7:00 p.m. on Monday and after 1:00 p.m. on Tuesday until service time at James H Davis Funeral Home.
